long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OVERVIEW

Build in public while building your business.

BuildReal helps business builders by providing a simple and effective way to publish on on Twitter without the typical distraction.

Most business builders realize the power of building their audience, but run into a common set of roadblocks:

> I don’t know what to say
> Does what I say really matter
> I don’t have a big enough audience to matter
> I’m busy and can’t seem to build the habit of publishing consistently
> Every time I get on Twitter I spend too much time there when I instead could be building

We’ve been there! This is why we built BuildReal which is: 

> an automated daily Twitter prompt 
> designed to extract your best thinking
> in a low-distraction channel

Users agree that these attributes of BuildReal lead them to publishing MORE frequently, with AUTHENTIC content in LESS time. Post quickly, then get back to building. 


KEY FEATURES:

1. Clean automated daily Twitter prompt and 280-character textbox
2. Disappearing prompt after 60 minutes (to inspire authentic ‘in-the moment’ content and limit ‘over-thinking’)
3. Hassle-free Twitter publishing (no need to log-on to Twitter)
4. Auto tagging as part of the ‘BuildReal’ community
